user.title: Connection details
user.description:
To make an connection to Brewfather you will need to fill in all fields below. Make sure the API-Key has the correct scopes.

Enable "single batch mode" if you are always fermenting just one drink at the time.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to register, please try again
error.invalid_scope: The API-Key doesn't have the correct scopes.
error.invalid_api_key: Unable to authenticate with given credentials.
error.unknown: Something went wrong, please check the log files.
